snippet: Croatia striker Nikica Jelavic has quit the national team because he was unhappy with being an unused substitute in Friday’s 1-0 win in Bulgaria in a Euro 2016 qualifier, coach Niko Kovac said....

headline.print_headline: Unhappy Jelavic Quits Croatia Amid Euro 2016 Qualifying
headline.main: Unhappy Jelavic Quits Croatia Amid Euro 2016 Qualifying

lead_paragraph: Croatia striker Nikica Jelavic has quit the national team because he was unhappy with being an unused substitute in Friday’s 1-0 win in Bulgaria in a Euro 2016 qualifier, coach Niko Kovac said.
